name: Rhythm of Creation
description:
Welcome to Rhythm of Creation, an AI-Based Rhythm Game. Instead of the community or me creating the levels, an AI automatically generates levels out of ANY music you feed it.

All your favorite songs can be mapped by the AI and you can play it as much as you wish! All you have to do is upload them! (Locally

This game was created for a video on my channel "DHMelon". Totally Original Gameplay! The AI Can Map Any Song! Even Some... Weird Ones IMPORTANT: The AI works the best with Classical Music or Piano Heavy songs but It can generate all other music as well, just not as good
